prodNameC: 免疫特 單純皰疹病毒第1型與第2型 免疫球蛋白G 試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Herpes I & II IgG Test Units: Each barcode-labeled unit contains one bead coated with HSV type I antigen (strain MacIntyre) and HSV type II antigen (G strain) (both antigens are partially purified, from infected cell lysates) in a barcode-labeled proprietary assay tube.

Herpes I & II IgG Reagent Wedges: 
A: 7.5 mL of a buffer solution, with preservative. 
B: 7.5 mL of alkaline phosphatase (bovine calf intestine) conjugated to monoclonal murine anti-human IgG antibody in buffer, with preservative. 

Herpes I & II IgG Adjustor: 4 mL of human serum with IgG reactive to HSV I & II, in a buffer, with preservative

Herpes I & II IgG Controls: 
Negative Control: 2.0 mL negative control containing human serum with IgG nonreactive to HSV I and II, with preservative. 
Positive Control: 2.0 mL positive control containing human serum with IgG reactive to HSV I and II, with preservative. 

IgG/IgM Sample Diluent: 100 mL nonhuman protein/buffer matrix, with preservative.
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 臺北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 利用化學冷光酵素免疫分析法，定性檢測人類血清中是否含有單純皰疹病毒(HSV) 第1型與第2型免疫球蛋白G，協助確認血清中單純皰疹病毒第1型與第2型的血清狀態。
mdFormat:
LKHS1 (100 tests)LKHS5 (500 tests)
註銷規格：LKHS5(500 tests)。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
